sentences.sContent: Refugees find it difficult to become assimilated into the community.
sentences.sCn: 难民觉得难以融入社区。

synos.tran: 吸收；使同化；把…比作；使相似

remMethod.val: as ＋ simil(相同) ＋ ate(使…) → 使相同 → 使同化

words.tran: 同化的；同化力的；同化作用的
同化；吸收；[生化] 同化作用

trans.tranOther: if people assimilate, or are assimilated into a country or group, they become part of that group and are accepted by the people in that group
